mainHero.title: Ayoub & Co
mainHero.subtitle: Auto Corporation
mainHero.description: Established in 2007, Ayoub & Co Auto Corporation is a premier wholesale dealer specializing in heavy machinery parts. We offer a diverse range of components including hydraulic pump parts, motor pump parts, swing motor parts, rotor parts, piston shoes, and swash plates. As an authorized distributor of Handok Hydraulic, a reputable Korean company, we ensure the highest quality standards. Serving clients across Pakistan and Afghanistan, we provide reliable service and premium products with nationwide delivery. Trust Ayoub & Co Auto Corporation for all your heavy machinery needs.

product.title: We deal in Premium Parts:
product.description: Explore our premium collection of heavy machinery parts and accessories. We offer a comprehensive range of high-quality products tailored to meet your needs. From essential components to specialized parts, our selection includes everything you need to keep your machinery operating at peak performance.

features.title: Latest & greatest
features.subtitle: We specialize in genuine parts from these brands
features.description: We exclusively offer products from renowned heavy machinery brands. Explore our selection for top-quality parts and services. Drive efficiency and success with trusted industry names.
